text: (maṉitarkaḷē!) Uṅkaḷukku muṉṉirunta ettaṉaiyō vakuppiṉarai avarkaḷ ceytu koṇṭirunta aniyāyattiṉ kāraṇamāka niccayamāka nām aḻittuviṭṭōm. Avarkaḷiṭam aṉuppappaṭṭa (nam) tūtarkaḷ teḷivāṉa attāṭcikaḷaiyē koṇṭu vantaṉar. Eṉiṉum (avaṟṟai) avarkaḷ nampavēyillai. Kuṟṟam ceyyum maṟṟa makkaḷukku ivvāṟē nām kūli koṭu(ttut taṇṭi)ppōm
